tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE routes (
  route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  origin_location VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  destination_location VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  distance_miles FLOAT NOT NULL,
  estimated_time_hours FLOAT NOT NULL,
  delivery_cost DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Routes (route_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	origin VARCHAR,
	destination VARCHAR,
	distance INT,
	estimated_time INT)

CREATE TABLE Vehicles (vehicle_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	vehicle_type VARCHAR,
	capacity INT,
	route_id UUID)

CREATE TABLE Deliveries (delivery_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	item_name VARCHAR,
	item_quantity INT,
	delivery_location VARCHAR,
	vehicle_id UUID)

CREATE TABLE Drivers (driver_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	driver_name VARCHAR,
	driver_license VARCHAR,
	vehicle_id UUID)

CREATE TABLE schedules (
  schedule_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  route_id UUID,
  vehicle_id UUID,
  departure_time TIMESTAMP,
  arrival_time TIMESTAMP
);
